nodes.text: Salliche was an agriworld located in the Core Worlds of the galaxy. It was represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator Bulgeski. It was also once ravaged by Norkronian raiders not long before 42 BBY. Senator Bulgeski asked the Jedi Order to intervene.
Salliche was first mentioned in the 2019 audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott.
